summary: Internal FBI email from the Victim Services Division regarding logistical planning for victim briefings related to the Epstein case. It includes draft invitation letters and agendas, and outlines FBI responsibilities for travel and lodging for victims and a support person.

persons.name: Program Manager
persons.context: Author of the email, coordinating logistics for Epstein victim briefings, including travel arrangements and communication with field offices.

events.title: Scheduled Victim Briefing in Miami
events.description: A victim briefing is scheduled in Miami, with dates switched due to room availability on October 7, 8, 11, and 15.

keyFacts: The FBI's Victim Services Division (VSD) is organizing briefings for victims of Jeffrey Epstein.
The FBI will pay for travel and lodging for each victim and one support person to attend a briefing at their chosen location.
Logistical coordination involves multiple FBI field offices and requires approval from New York and SDNY for certain communication details.
A draft 'Family Briefing Document' was slated to be available the following week.
